attackStats.name: LUK
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/katara-booster.png} tip={Katara Booster (2nd Job)} val={+20}> <bg src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training (2nd Job)} val={+30}> <bg type={def} sub={opt} src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior (4th Job)} val={+15% to assigned AP} subSrc={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} subTip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} subVal={extra +400%}>

attackStats.name: Attack
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/common/heros-echo.png} tip={Hero's Echo (Beginner Skill)} val={+4%}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/channel-karma.png} tip={Channel Karma (2nd Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/katara-expert.png} tip={Katara Expert (4th Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/thorns.png} tip={Thorns (4th Job)} val={+30}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/shadow-meld.png} tip={Shadow Meld (3rd Job)} val={+15 upon activating}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/last-resort.png} tip={Last Resort (5th Job)} val={+30}>

attackStats.name: Crit Rate
attackStats.detail: <bg val={Base +5%}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/sharpness.png} tip={Sharpness (4th Job)} val={+35%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/shadow-meld.png} tip={Shadow Meld (3rd Job)} val={+100% upon activating}>

attackStats.name: Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/blade-clone.png} tip={Blade Clone (Hyper Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg type={debuff} src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/flashbang.png} tip={Flashbang (2nd Job+)} val={+10%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/thief/epic-adventure.png} tip={Epic Adventure (Hyper Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/link-skills/thiefs-cunning.png} tip={Thief's Cunning (Link Skill)} val={+18% upon debuffing enemy}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+20%}>

attackStats.name: Final Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/venom.png} tip={Venom (2nd Job+)} val={+9%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/shadow-meld.png} tip={Shadow Meld (3rd Job)} val={+7%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/katara-expert.png} tip={Katara Expert (4th Job)} val={+20%}> × <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/final-cut.png} tip={Final Cut (4th Job)} val={+40%}> × <bg type={temp} sub={opt} src={/class-icons/common/advanced-dark-sight.png} tip={Advanced Dark Sight (3rd Job)} val={+20% while in Dark Sight} subSrc={/class-icons/5th-job/shadow-walker.png} subTip={Shadow Walker (5th Job)} subVal={extra +14% while active}> × <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/last-resort.png} tip={Last Resort (5th Job)} val={+10% in Stage 1} val={+24% in Stage 2}>

buffInfo.active: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/mirror-image.png} tip={Mirror Image (3rd Job)} dur={[200s]}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/blade-clone.png} tip={Blade Clone (Hyper Skill)} dur={[90s]}>
buffInfo.buffCd: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/final-cut.png} tip={Final Cut (4th Job)} dur={[60s](63s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/thief/epic-adventure.png} tip={Epic Adventure (Hyper Skill)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/last-resort.png} tip={Last Resort (5th Job)} dur={[30s](60s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/shadow-walker.png} tip={Shadow Walker (5th Job)} dur={[20s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/common/heros-echo.png} tip={Hero's Echo (Beginner Skill)} dur={[2400s](300s cd)}>
buffInfo.iFrame: <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight (1st Job)} dur={[200s](Special, 0 - 15s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/chains-of-hell.png} tip={Chains of Hell (3rd Job)} dur={[1.5s](45s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/final-cut.png} tip={Final Cut (4th Job)} dur={[3s](90s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/karma-blade.png} tip={Karma Blade (6th Job)} dur={[360s cd]}>
buffInfo.damageReduce: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/asuras-anger.png} tip={Asura's Anger (Hyper Skill)} dur={[Up to 3s](-50% | 60s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/blade-storm.png} tip={Blade Storm (5th Job)} dur={[Up to 2s](-50% | 60s cd)}>

details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Thief to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Dual Blade' option in the Character Creation screen. Dual Blades have their own separate creation button like Cannoneer and Pathfinder. As well, they have a different story than regular Explorers but are part of the same class group

build: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/thief/flash-jump.png} tip={Flash Jump}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/side-step.png} tip={Side Step}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/bandit-slash.png} tip={Bandit Slash}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/katara-mastery.png} tip={Katara Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/bandit-slash-boost.png} tip={Bandit Slash Boost}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/self-haste.png} tip={Self Haste}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/tornado-spin.png} tip={Tornado Spin}>

<tt src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/katara-booster.png} tip={Katara Booster}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/channel-karma.png} tip={Channel Karma}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/slash-storm.png} tip={Slash Storm}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/fatal-blow.png} tip={Fatal Blow}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/venom.png} tip={Venom}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/flashbang.png} tip={Flashbang}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/slash-storm-boost.png} tip={Slash Storm Boost}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/flying-assaulter.png} tip={Flying Assaulter}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/life-drain.png} tip={Life Drain}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/advanced-dark-sight.png} tip={Advanced Dark Sight}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/enveloping-darkness.png} tip={Enveloping Darkness}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/shadow-meld.png} tip={Shadow Meld}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/mirror-image.png} tip={Mirror Image}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/bloody-storm.png} tip={Bloody Storm}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/blade-ascension.png} tip={Blade Ascension}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/chains-of-hell.png} tip={Chains of Hell}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/sharpness.png} tip={Sharpness}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/toxic-venom.png} tip={Toxic Venom}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/katara-expert.png} tip={Katara Expert}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/thorns.png} tip={Thorns}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/blade-fury.png} tip={Blade Fury}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/mirrored-target.png} tip={Mirrored Target}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/final-cut.png} tip={Final Cut}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/sudden-raid.png} tip={Sudden Raid}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/phantom-blow.png} tip={Phantom Blow}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/heros-will.png} tip={Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
Dual Blades have two additional Job Advancements at Lv. 20 and Lv. 45

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/phantom-blow-reinforce.png} tip={Phantom Blow - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/phantom-blow-guardbreak.png} tip={Phantom Blow - Guardbreak}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/phantom-blow-extra-strike.png} tip={Phantom Blow - Extra Strike}> Phantom Blow - Reinforce, Guardbreak, and Extra Strike_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/blade-fury-reinforce.png} tip={Blade Fury - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/blade-fury-spread.png} tip={Blade Fury - Spread}> Blade Fury - Reinforce and Spread_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/phantom-blow.png} tip={Phantom Blow (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/asuras-anger.png} tip={Asura's Anger (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/blade-clone.png} tip={Blade Clone (Hyper Skill)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/blade-fury.png} tip={Blade Fury (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/sudden-raid.png} tip={Sudden Raid (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/blade-ascension.png} tip={Blade Ascension (3rd Job)}>
notes: Either categories can be maxed first based on if you prioritize bossing or mobbing
Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category so that the skills boosted match your priorities
4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/bandit-slash.png} tip={Bandit Slash (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/tornado-spin.png} tip={Tornado Spin (1st Job+)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/fatal-blow.png} tip={Fatal Blow (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/slash-storm.png} tip={Slash Storm (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/flashbang.png} tip={Flashbang (2nd Job+)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/flying-assaulter.png} tip={Flying Assaulter (2nd Job+)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/blade-ascension.png} tip={Blade Ascension (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/bloody-storm.png} tip={Bloody Storm (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/chains-of-hell.png} tip={Chains of Hell (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/blade-fury.png} tip={Blade Fury (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/phantom-blow.png} tip={Phantom Blow (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/final-cut.png} tip={Final Cut (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/sudden-raid.png} tip={Sudden Raid (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/asuras-anger.png} tip={Asura's Anger (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/blade-clone.png} tip={Blade Clone (Hyper Skill)}>

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to Dres, TMoney, and the members of the Dual Blade Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build + Boost Nodes Build

extraContent.title: Dark Sight
content: <em text={Credits to the Night Walker Discord for the list of attacks avoidable with Dark Sight. For an actively maintained version, please check out the Night Walker Discord}>

In 1st Job, <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight (1st Job)}> Dark Sight is unlocked that allows you to dodge certain attacks. Below is a list of avoidable attacks that have been tested:

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Kerning City Back Alley when used.\nCooldown: 600 sec
details: Gained from completing the quest 'Return to the Secret Garden' Lady Syl at Lv. 20

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/77/An_Arrangement_from_the_Goddess%2E} title={"An Arrangement from the Goddess"}>

primary.name: Dark Sight
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, hides in the shadows for 200 seconds.\nWhen Dark Sight is deactivated, cooldown increased per attack dodged: 3 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.
primary.desc: While active, you cannot hit or be hit by enemies
details: While active, pressing the Skill Key again or using an attack will cancel Dark Sight
You can use <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/thief/flash-jump.png} tip={Flash Jump (1st Job)}> while in Dark Sight
Has a cooldown (3s, stacks up to 5 times) per attack dodged

primary.name: Flash Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 22, jumps further. Able to use 2 times consecutively.
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice<bp_While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump_>
Horizontal jump can be used twice in a row

primary.name: Side Step
primary.shortDesc: Avoidability +15%

primary.name: Bandit Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 13, Damage: 90%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 3
primary.desc: Lash forward with crossing blades

primary.name: Bandit Slash Boost
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Damage: 120, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Number of Attacks: 3
details: Increases %Damage and Max Enemies Hit of attack

primary.name: Tornado Spin
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 36, Damage: 380%, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Dash forward while pushing enemies back
details: Can be linked to <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/blade-ascension.png} tip={Blade Ascension (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Katara Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Dagger and Katara Mastery: +50%

primary.name: Self Haste
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Speed by 40, Jump by 23, and Max Speed by 20.

primary.name: Recruit's Agility
primary.shortDesc: Allows you to Flash Jump upwards
primary.desc: Up jump skill
details: Can be activated by pressing the Up Arrow Key and Jump Key while in the air

primary.name: Fatal Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Number of Attacks: 7, Damage: 108%
primary.desc: Strike one enemy with a barrage of attacks

primary.name: Slash Storm
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Damage: 190%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Slash forward at multiple enemies

primary.name: Katara Booster
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, Luck: +20

primary.name: Channel Karma
primary.shortDesc: Attack +30, Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases LUK by 30 and DEX by 30

primary.name: Slash Storm Boost
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 18, Damage: 220%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3

primary.name: Flying Assaulter
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 44, Damage: 165%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Monsters Hit: 8, Stun Chance: 20%, Stun Duration: 6 sec
primary.desc: Dive down diagonally from the air
details: Attack has a chance to stun enemies
Can only be used in the air

Can be linked with <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/tornado-spin.png} tip={Tornado Spin (2nd Job)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/bloody-storm.png} tip={Bloody Storm (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Flashbang
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 65, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 250%, 100% chance for Accuracy decrease: -20%, Duration: 60 sec, damage of all your skills increased by 10% against affected enemies.
primary.desc: Throw a flashbang forward that debuffs enemies hit

primary.name: Venom
primary.shortDesc: Status Chance: 30%, Damage Over Time: 90% damage every 1 sec for 6 sec\nFinal Damage: +9%
primary.desc: Permanently increases %Final Damage and grants a chance for attacks to apply a poison debuff

primary.name: Bloody Storm
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Damage: 265%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 3\n[Passive Effect: Increases damage of Tornado Spin and Flying Assaulter by 20%]
primary.desc: Slash furiously around you
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases the %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/tornado-spin.png} tip={Tornado Spin (2nd Job)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/flying-assaulter.png} tip={Flying Assualter (2nd Job+)}>

Can be linked with <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/tornado-spin.png} tip={Tornado Spin (2nd Job)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/flying-assaulter.png} tip={Flying Assualter (2nd Job+)}>

primary.name: Blade Ascension
primary.shortDesc: Lifts you into the air. MP Cost: 41, Damage: 175% Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3\nCan only be used once after making an upward Flash Jump\nCannot use Flash Jump upward after using Blade Ascension
primary.desc: Slash upward launching up into the air
details: Pressing the Up Arrow Key and Skill Key together will boost you up higher
Can be linked with <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/flying-assaulter.png} tip={Flying Assualter (2nd Job+)}>

The following limitations are applied to this skill:<bp_Can only be used one-time when used after an <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/thief/flash-jump.png} tip={Flash Jump (1st Job)}> upward double jump_When casting this skill first, <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/thief/flash-jump.png} tip={Flash Jump (1st Job)}> upward double jump cannot be used_>

primary.name: Chains of Hell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 75, Invincibility Duration: 1.5 sec\nEnemy hit by chain, Damage: 150%, Number of Attacks: 1. Consecutive attack afterwards, Damage: 150%, Number of Attacks: 7, Stun Chance: 10%, Stun Duration: 4., Additional Critical Rate: 100%, Invincible during attack\nCooldown: 45 sec.
primary.desc: Pulls an enemy close and deals a deadly barrage of attacks
details: Attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit and has a chance to stun the enemy
You are invincible while casting and during the attack
The skill can be used while other skills are being used

primary.name: Mirror Image
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 67, summons a shadow that makes an additional hit that is 70% of the final damage for all attacks (except Flashbang) for 200 sec.
primary.desc: Create a clone that mimics your attacks, increasing the number of hits you deal per attack
details: The clone's attack deals reduced %Final Damage
Does not mimic <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/flashbang.png} tip={Flashbang (2nd Job+)}>, summoning skills, and 5th Job Common Skills

primary.name: Advanced Dark Sight
primary.shortDesc:
49% chance to maintain Dark Sight on attacking.
20% chance to auto-trigger Dark Sight
Final Damage +20% when attacking during Dark Sight.
If you dodge an attack that deals damage proportional to Max HP, using the Dark Sight that activates when you are hit, the Dark Sight's remaining time will be reduced by 20% of its maximum
primary.desc: While <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight (1st Job)}> is active, gain increased %Final Damage and attacks have a chance to not deactivate the buff
details: Additionally, upon getting hit, there is a chance to automatically activate <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight (1st Job)}>

When the automatic version of <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight (1st Job)}> activates, dodging an attack that deals %Max HP will slightly reduce the duration but does not apply a cooldown

primary.name: Life Drain
primary.shortDesc: 10% chance to recover 20% HP on hit.\n[Passive Effect: Boss Damage: +5%]

primary.name: Enveloping Darkness
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +20%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%

primary.name: Shadow Meld
primary.shortDesc: Dodge Chance: 30%, Upon successful dodge, Attack Power +15 and all attacks performed afterwards will be Critical Hits for 7 sec. Cooldown upon successful dodge: 5 sec.\nFinal Damage: +7%.
primary.desc: Grants a chance to dodge incoming attacks and gain a buff on successful dodges
details: [Buff]: All your attacks are guaranteed Critical Hits and grants flat Attack

primary.name: Blade Fury
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 65, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 250%, Number of Attacks: 5, Ignore Defense: 20%
primary.desc: Spin violently damaging nearby enemies

primary.name: Phantom Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 42, Damage: 330%, Enemies Hit: 3, Number of Attacks: 6, Ignore Defense: 30%
primary.desc: Deals a flurry of piercing attacks forward

primary.name: Final Cut
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 400, consumes 10% of Max HP, Damage: 2000%, Max Enemies Hit: 8.
Skill damage will be reduced if the charge time is too short
Final Damage: +40%, Duration: 60 sec., 3 sec. invincibility after usage.
Cooldown: 63 sec.
primary.desc: Stab forward dealing devastating damage and provides a buff
details: Holding the Skill Key will increase the damage of the attack
You are briefly invincible after using Final Cut

primary.name: Sudden Raid
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 290, Damage: 494%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 7, Damage Over Time: 210% damage every 1 sec for 10 sec\nCooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Unleash a devastating large attack that applies a damaging debuff

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Mirrored Target
primary.shortDesc: Active Effects - MP Cost: 135, Dummy HP: 19000, Dummy Duration: 90 sec, damage taken is reduced by 20% while the dummy is summoned, Shadow Meld occurs when the dummy is hit.\nDummy does not take damage from some attacks.\n[Passive Effect - Avoidability: 25%, Defense: +60%]
primary.desc: Creates a dummy that draws in enemy aggression
details: Can only be used while <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/mirror-image.png} tip={Mirror Image (3rd Job)}> is active
When the dummy is attacked, <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/shadow-meld.png} tip={Shadow Meld (3rd Job)}> will be triggered
While summoned, damage taken is reduced (excludes %Max HP attacks)
Dummy has a fixed amount of HP

primary.name: Thorns
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30, Knockback Resistance: +60%

primary.name: Sharpness
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +35%, Critical Damage: +15%

primary.name: Toxic Venom
primary.shortDesc: Poison Chance: 50%, 160% damage every 1 sec for 8 sec, can be stacked 3 times
details: Can now be stacked (up to 3 times)

primary.name: Katara Expert
primary.shortDesc: Dagger and Katara Mastery: +70%, Attack Power: +30, Final Damage: +20%
details: Now grants flat Attack and increases %Final Damage

hyperActive.name: Blade Clone
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Damage: +10%\n[Final Attack Skills] Duration: 90 sec, Extra Attack Chance for Direct Skills: 100%, Bonus Damage: 240%
hyperActive.desc: Increases %Damage and direct successful attacks deal an additional attack
details: Right-clicking the skill will toggle the visual effect ON/OFF

hyperActive.name: Asura's Anger
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 300, Duration: 3 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 560%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Attacks: 11. The effect ends immediately once all attacks have been made.
Enemy Defense Ignored: 100%
Can move and jump while using the skill. Damage taken while attacking, including attacks that deal damage in proportion to Max HP: -50%
Cooldown: 60 sec.
hyperActive.desc: Unleash a torrent of slashes around you
details: While casting, reduces damage taken including %Max HP attacks, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance), and prevents Critical Abnormal Statuses
You can move and jump while using Asura's Anger

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nApplies to any Explorer class in the party\nCooldown: 120 sec.

fifthMain.name: Blade Storm
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20 per attack. Attack up to 10 enemies, with 1270% damage, 7 times, then deals 570% damage to up to 10 enemies 7 times for 2 sec., ignoring 100% additional Enemy DEF.\nDamage taken while the key is held, including attacks that deal damage in proportion to Max HP: -50%\nCooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: While held, unleash a barrage of slashes forward
details: While held, reduces damage taken including %Max HP attacks, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance), and prevents Critical Abnormal Statuses

fifthMain.name: Blades of Destiny
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Damage: 880%, Number of Attacks: 7, Chase Cut Activation Count: 5, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Enemy DEF Ignored: 30%\nCooldown: 10 sec
fifthMain.desc: Releas a flurry of blades all around

fifthMain.name: Blade Tornado
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 750, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1320%, Number of Attacks: 7
At intervals, Typhoon activates whirldwind dealing Damage: 880%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 6. Activates whirlwind up to 6 times on 1 enemy.
For Spinning Attack and Typhoon, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +100%
Cooldown: 12 sec
fifthMain.desc: Send forward a tornado that damages enemies it passes through

fifthMain.name: Haunted Edge
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 750, Cooldown: 12 sec, all attacks of Haunted Edge ignores 30% of enemy defense\nHaunted Edge-Asura: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1045%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Sword Winds: 6, Sword Wind Damage: 1100%, Number of Sword Wind Attacks: 3, Final Damage of sword wind reduces by 50% when one enemy is hit by several sword winds\nHaunted Edge-Yaksa: Chase Cut Activation: 5, Max Enemies Hit: 2, Damage: 945%, Number of Attacks: 4
fifthMain.desc: Periodically, when using <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/blade-fury.png} tip={Blade Fury (4th Job)}> or <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/phantom-blow.png} tip={Phantom Blow (4th Job)}>, an additional attack will trigger
details: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/blade-fury.png} tip={Blade Fury (4th Job)}> [Sura]:Slashes around you and creates homing blade winds<bp_Blade winds are unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/mirror-image.png} tip={Mirror Image (3rd Job)}>_Enemies hit by multiple Sword Winds, each additional Sword Wind deals reduced %Final Damage_>
<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/phantom-blow.png} tip={Phantom Blow (4th Job)}> [Yaksa]: Slashes violently forward

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/phantom-blow.png} tip={Phantom Blow (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Phantom Blow
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 52, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 530%, Number of Attacks: 6, Ignore Defense: 40%

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/asuras-anger.png} tip={Asura's Anger (Hyper Skill)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Asura's Anger
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 330, Duration: 3 sec., Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1110%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Attacks: 11. The effect ends immediately once all aattacks have been made.
Monster DEF Ignored: 100%
Can move and jump while using the skill. Damage taken while attacking, including attacks t hat deal damage in proportion to Max HP: -50%
Cooldown: 60 sec.
[Passive Effect: HEXA Phantom Blow Damage: +106% (additive)]

masteryCore.name: 3rd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/blade-clone.png} tip={Blade Clone (Hyper Skill)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Blade Clone
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 230, Damage: +10%\n[Final Attack Skill] Duration: 90 sec, Extra Attack Chance for Direct Skills: 100%, Bonus Damage: 480%

masteryCore.name: Mortality
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 67. When a direct skill attack other than a common skill lands 15 times, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 425%, Number of Attacks: 6, Yaksha's Slash Count: 4 times\nCooldown: 1 sec

masteryCore.name: 4th Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/blade-fury.png} tip={Blade Fury (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dual-blade/sudden-raid.png} tip={Sudden Raid (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Blade Fury
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 76, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 580%, Number of Attacks: 5
Enhances to Fury Jet every 6 sec.
Fury Jet - MP Cost: 84, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 590%, Number of Attacks: 6
[Passive Effect - HEXA Phantom Blow Damage: +42% points]

masteryCore.name: HEXA Sudden Raid
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 340, Damage: 1020%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 7, Damage Over Time: 590% damage for every 1 sec. for 10 sec.\nCooldown: 14 sec.\n[Passive Effect - Mortality Damage: +400% points]

originSkill.name: Karma Blade
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting
The God of Hellfire descends, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 960%, Number of Attacks: 5, Chase Cuts: 6. Afterwards, Damage: 900%, Number of Attacks: 7, Chase Cuts: 20
When attack hits for 20 sec, 1 Karma Blade use is consumed for an additional attack, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: 1715%, Number of Attacks: 7, Cooldown: 0.1 sec
Karma Blade Uses: 25
The God of Hellfire manifests when the Karma Blade is completely consumed or its duration ends, Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1100%, Number of Attacks: 7, Chase Cuts: 30
When the God of Hellfire manifests, invincible and ignores status effects for 1 sec.
Cooldown: 360 sec

meta: Dual Blade is a LUK thief class part of the Explorers. Dual Blade utilize Daggers as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Dual Blade can equip Kataras
